experience.title: experience
experience.description:
Over the past 5 years, I have been building my skills and experience by working on various projects and continuously learning new technologies. I enjoy turning ideas into real, usable products and focusing on writing clean, efficient, and maintainable code. I’m motivated by challenges and always looking for ways to improve both technically and creatively.

Throughout this journey, I have collaborated with different people, explored multiple tools and frameworks, and gained a deeper understanding of how to solve problems effectively. I value consistency, attention to detail, and growth, and I am always open to new opportunities that allow me to learn, contribute, and create meaningful work.

hard-skills.title: hard-skills
hard-skills.description:
As a front-end developer, I focus on creating responsive, user-friendly, and visually engaging interfaces. I enjoy transforming designs into functional web experiences using modern technologies, while ensuring performance, accessibility, and clean code. I am passionate about delivering interfaces that not only look good but also provide a smooth and intuitive user experience.

In my work, I continuously explore new tools and frameworks to improve my skills and stay up to date with industry trends. I value collaboration, attention to detail, and problem-solving, and I strive to build products that are reliable, scalable, and enjoyable for users across different devices.

soft-skills.title: soft-skills
soft-skills.description:
I bring more than five years of experience in building modern and responsive web interfaces, with a strong focus on usability, performance, and clean design. I am dedicated to delivering high-quality front-end solutions that align with both user needs and business goals.

Through continuous learning and hands-on projects, I have developed strong problem-solving skills and the ability to adapt to new technologies quickly. I enjoy collaborating with teams, refining details, and turning complex requirements into simple, effective user experiences.

bio.title: bio
bio.description:
About me
I have 5 years of experience in web development, working on building responsive, scalable, and user-focused web applications. I specialize in translating ideas and designs into functional interfaces while maintaining clean, maintainable code and good performance practices.

I take pride in my ability to solve problems effectively, adapt to new technologies, and collaborate with others to deliver reliable and polished digital products. I am always eager to learn, improve my skills, and contribute to meaningful project.

interests.title: interests
interests.description: I am constantly learning and improving my skills to keep up with the ever-evolving world of web development. I enjoy exploring new technologies, refining my workflow, and applying best practices to create efficient, maintainable, and user-friendly web applications. I am motivated by challenges and always strive to deliver high-quality results in every project I work on.

education.title: education
education.description:
I have always been passionate about building meaningful digital experiences and turning ideas into well-crafted web solutions. I enjoy working on interfaces that balance aesthetics, usability, and performance, and I take pride in creating products that feel intuitive and reliable for users.

Over time, this passion has driven me to continuously improve my skills, explore new technologies, and refine my approach to problem-solving. I value learning, consistency, and attention to detail, and I am motivated to grow as a developer while contributing to impactful and high-quality projects.

sports.title: sports
sports.description:
I am an avid sports enthusiast and enjoy staying active as part of a balanced lifestyle. Sports help me build discipline, teamwork, and resilience, which positively influence the way I approach both personal and professional challenges.
Through regular physical activity, I have learned the importance of consistency, focus, and maintaining a healthy mindset, values that I also bring into my work and daily routines.

favorite-games.title: favorite-games
favorite-games.description:
I am a passionate gamer with a deep appreciation for strategy, problem-solving, and immersive experiences. Gaming has taught me patience, quick thinking, and how to adapt to changing situations—skills that I carry into my work as a front-end developer.

Beyond the enjoyment, gaming inspires creativity and motivates me to explore new technologies and approaches, helping me craft better digital experiences and stay engaged with challenges in both professional and personal projects.
